testcase.name: Amazon SearchBox functionality should have menu
testcase.system-out: Given user is landed on amazon homepage.....................................passed And user should be able to click on "all" drop down list in the searchBox...passed And user should be able to click on "Alexa Skills" link.....................passed And user should be able to click on search button...........................passed When user hover the mouse on "Features and Skills" link.....................passed And user can select "Entertainment" from the list...........................passed Then user should see the "Alexa Entertainment" displayed....................passed
